subtitle: Vocabulary learning tool
create_description: Flipword was created to give its users the opportunity to build a personalised vocabulary list. In this way, everyone can learn the vocabulary words that they lack in their daily lives
extension_promo_title: Thanks to the browser extension, add easily words to your list while browsing. Then review them within the application
extension_promo: The purpose of this browser extension is to make it easy to add words to your list. If during your daily browsing you don't understand some words written in a foreign language, you can easily translate it and add it to your list
your_turn: It's your turn ! Test your knowledge!
extension_title_text: Thank you to have downloaded Flipword extension !
profile_presentation: Hello there, I'm 23 and I love building quality software.
which_learned_language: Which language you want to learn ?
congratulation: Congratulations You are ready to use Flipword! 🎉
this_is_an_example: Here is an example of a foreign language text that you may encounter when browsing:
send_word_explication: Select the word that is a problem, so an Apparetra translation button and you will be able to send this word to your vocabulary list.
